title: Have a Pixel 3a, just updated and restarted. Asks for unlock PIN, enter it, says its wrong.
content:
hi. Have a Pixel 3a. Just performed a System update and restarted automatically as per usual. Upon restart, enter the SIM PIN - all good. Asks for screen unlock PIN, i enter the correct pin (6 digits) and it says it's wrong. What now? Some urgent help would be much appreciated, as I am unable to use the Phone at the moment.
Thank you.
